Interface RawCustomGradient

Functional Interface:
This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.
@FunctionalInterface public interface RawCustomGradient
A custom gradient for an op of unspecified type. Should be registered using TensorFlow.registerCustomGradient(String, RawCustomGradient).

Creates the gradient based off of a GraphOperation. To operate on the op input class instead use CustomGradient.

The op type of op will depend on the op type string passed to the registration method. Note that the registration method can be called more than once, resulting this gradient function being used for multiple different op types.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static TFJ_GradFuncAdapter
    adapter(RawCustomGradient gradient)
    Create an adapter for the custom gradient so that it can be used by native code.
    List<Operand<?>>
    call(Ops tf, GraphOperation op, List<Output<?>> gradInputs)
    Calculate the gradients for op.

  • Method Details

    • call

      List<Operand<?>> call(Ops tf, GraphOperation op, List<Output<?>> gradInputs)
      Calculate the gradients for op.
      Parameters:
      tf - the Ops instance used to create ops
      op - the op to calculate the gradients of.
      gradInputs - the gradients of the op's outputs.
      Returns:
      the gradients of the op's inputs.

    • adapter

      static TFJ_GradFuncAdapter adapter(RawCustomGradient gradient)
      Create an adapter for the custom gradient so that it can be used by native code.

      You should not be calling this yourself, use TensorFlow.registerCustomGradient(String, RawCustomGradient).
